title: Alison Hammond Loves Her Birmingham Home
summary: Alison Hammond is a TV presenter who is proud to be from Birmingham, a city in England. She grew up there and still lives nearby. Alison says Birmingham helps her stay grounded and she loves her Brummie accent, which she will never change. She also talks about feeling healthier after losing some weight by eating less and moving more. This helps her with health issues like diabetes and sore knees. Alison enjoys spending weekends with her son and might consider hosting a dance show called Strictly Come Dancing in the future. She cares about the show and wants someone who will look after it well.
